title: "filter_10xh5"
---

## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/process_10xh5/filter_10xh5/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name                 | type         | description                                            |
|:---------------------|:-------------|:-------------------------------------------------------|
| --input              | string       | An h5 file from the 10x genomics website.              |
| --output             | file         | Output h5 file.                                        |
| --min_library_size   | integer      | Minimum library size.                                  |
| --min_cells_per_gene | integer      | Minimum number of cells per gene.                      |
| --keep_feature_types | string       | Specify which feature types will never be filtered out |
| --verbose            | boolean_true | Increase verbosity                                     |
